languages.text: {n}На мгновение в изумрудном взгляде проскальзывает сочувствие.{/n} "Нет смысла корить себя — разум мон-кай слаб и никогда не сможет осознать всю глубину коварства и извращенности мыслей темных кузенов. Будь на твоем месте иной мон-кай, пути судьбы остались бы неизменны".

{n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."
languages.original_text: {n}На мгновение в изумрудном взгляде проскальзывает сочувствие.{/n} "Нет смысла корить себя — разум мон-кай слаб и никогда не сможет осознать всю глубину коварства и извращенности мыслей темных кузенов. Будь на твоем месте иной мон-кай, пути судьбы остались бы неизменны".

{n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."

languages.text: {n}Vous remarquez un bref éclat de compréhension dans le regard d'Yrliet.{/n} « Il n'y a nulle sagesse à s'en vouloir. L'intellect d'un mon-keigh est faible et incapable de saisir le niveau de trahison ou de perversité des miens. S'il y avait eu un autre mon-keigh à votre place, les voies du destin en seraient restées inchangées. »
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous remarquez un bref éclat de compréhension dans le regard d'Yrliet.{/n} « Il n'y a nulle sagesse à s'en vouloir. L'intellect d'un mon-keigh est faible et incapable de saisir le niveau de trahison ou de perversité des miens. S'il y avait eu un autre mon-keigh à votre place, les voies du destin en seraient restées inchangées. »

languages.text: {n}你注意到伊莉耶特眼中闪过一丝同情。{/n}“责备自己是愚蠢的行为。猴子的智力过于孱弱，根本无法想象我那些黑暗的表亲有多么奸诈，有多深。即便换成其他猴子坐在你的位置上，这命中注定的道路也不会改变。”
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到伊莉耶特眼中闪过一丝同情。{/n}“责备自己是愚蠢的行为。猴子的智力过于孱弱，根本无法想象我那些黑暗的表亲有多么奸诈，有多深。即便换成其他猴子坐在你的位置上，这命中注定的道路也不会改变。”

languages.text: {n}In Yrliets Augen blitzt kurz ein Funke Mitgefühl auf.{/n} "Es liegt keine Weisheit darin, Euch selbst die Schuld zu geben. Der Intellekt eines Chem-Pan-Sey ist schwach und kann niemals die Tiefen des Verrats und der gedanklichen Tücke meiner dunklen Verwandtschaft ergründen. Wäre an Eurer Stelle ein anderer Chem-Pan-Sey gestanden, wäre der Pfad des Schicksals unverändert geblieben."
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."

traits.locale_text: {n}In Yrliets Augen blitzt kurz ein Funke Mitgefühl auf.{/n} "Es liegt keine Weisheit darin, Euch selbst die Schuld zu geben. Der Intellekt eines Chem-Pan-Sey ist schwach und kann niemals die Tiefen des Verrats und der gedanklichen Tücke meiner dunklen Verwandtschaft ergründen. Wäre an Eurer Stelle ein anderer Chem-Pan-Sey gestanden, wäre der Pfad des Schicksals unverändert geblieben."

languages.text: {n}Detectas un breve atisbo de simpatía en los ojos de Yrliet.{/n} «No hay nada de inteligente en echarse la culpa a sí mismo, el intelecto de un mon-keigh es inferior y nunca podrá entender la traición y la retorcida forma de pensar de mis oscuros semejantes. Si otro mon-keigh se hubiera enfrentado a lo mismo que usted, el resultado habría sido el mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."

traits.locale_text: {n}Detectas un breve atisbo de simpatía en los ojos de Yrliet.{/n} «No hay nada de inteligente en echarse la culpa a sí mismo, el intelecto de un mon-keigh es inferior y nunca podrá entender la traición y la retorcida forma de pensar de mis oscuros semejantes. Si otro mon-keigh se hubiera enfrentado a lo mismo que usted, el resultado habría sido el mismo».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの瞳に一瞬同情の光が浮かぶ。{/n}「己を責めるのは賢明ではない…モン＝ケイは頭が弱く、我が闇の血族の裏切り行為と思考の歪みの深さを理解することはできまい。その立場に別のモン＝ケイがいても、運命の道は変わらないだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの瞳に一瞬同情の光が浮かぶ。{/n}「己を責めるのは賢明ではない…モン＝ケイは頭が弱く、我が闇の血族の裏切り行為と思考の歪みの深さを理解することはできまい。その立場に別のモン＝ケイがいても、運命の道は変わらないだろう」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in gözlerinden bir an için şefkat yansıyor.{/n} "Kendini suçlamana lüzum yok. Mon-keigh soyunun zihni zayıftır, benim soyumun hıyanetini ve çarpık düşünceleri idrak edemez. Yerinde başka bir mon-keigh olsaydı kader yine aynı yoldan yürürdü."
languages.original_text: {n}You notice a brief flash of sympathy in Yrliet's eyes.{/n} "There is no wisdom in blaming yourself — a mon-keigh's intellect is weak and can never fathom the depths of my dark kin's treachery and twistedness of thought. Had there been another mon-keigh in your place, the paths of fate would have remained unchanged."
